attributes.action: restrict the manufacture of fireworks to that of visually attractive, but noiseless
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I see no reason why the enjoyment at firework displays would be any less if noise levels were nil.   Perhaps even animals would become tolerant without enduring the agonies which they undoubtedly suffer, seemingly from early October through to mid January each year.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
